column4: I have a question for experienced users...is it possible to upgrade to a new version of Ubuntu (or another linux distro) without losing your Linux or Windows files?
Upgradeing is a feature of the pacakge manager. so yes its possible.
you can. but need to be carefull.  sunce the order of the users added, and the uid's assigned to them. can cause issues.
use differnt usernames on each disrto would be a good idea.
